title: If Rengar is so unhealthy..
body:
Riot have openly stated that Rengar is the most unhealthy champion in the game.

So if he is so unhealthy, and even the people who hate admitting that about champs, still say that, 
Why isn't he just disabled until the assassin re-work? why leave such a game breaking champion to roam freely until the end of the season?

replies.body: he is unhealthy because he either 1 hits and solo carries, or he is more useless than a turd

Tahm kench is more obese tho...
If u look at the size of rengar compared to tahm its obvious that tahm is the more obese one. Even tahm has a master chef skin... Oh and the amazing urf skin. Dat one is best
Rengar has so many bad matchups against tier 1 junglers at the moment

Unhealthy =/= game breaking

Riot think the playstyle is unhealthy, as Talon12 said, alongside most feast or famine champs.
In my opinion Rengar isn't op at all lol. Yeah he's pretty good at deleting ADC's and squishies but he's no better at it than any other Assasin like zed or talon.

Need to learn his weakness and strengths. in mid/high elo you can beat a rengar so easy cause they know what his weakness is but in low elo say Bronze, Silver, gold of course his going to trash on everyone cause they don't care about the game and have no intention to stop and think about buying a pink ward or grouping and fighting they think for themselves. There are other ways other then just disabling him until assassin rework and their are others that can take his place with ease its just that everyone is getting nerfed and cause he was having trouble before with these meta picks now that they have been nerfed his starting to shine through patch after patch.
